SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.distributed

Class ServerImpl

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.distributed.ServerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Server, Serializable, Remote
public class ServerImpl extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Server
Represents a server implementation for a game server.
See Also:

    • ServerImpl

      public ServerImpl() throws RemoteException
      Constructs a new ServerImpl instance.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote error occurs during object initialization.

    • ServerImpl

      public ServerImpl(int port) throws RemoteException
      Constructs a new ServerImpl instance with a specific port number.
      Parameters:
      port - the port number to use for the server.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote error occurs during object initialization.

    • ServerImpl

      public ServerImpl(int port, RMIClientSocketFactory csf, RMIServerSocketFactory ssf) throws RemoteException
      Constructs a new ServerImpl instance with a specific port number and custom socket factories.
      Parameters:
      port - the port number to use for the server.
      csf - the client socket factory to use for creating client sockets.
      ssf - the server socket factory to use for creating server sockets.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote error occurs during object initialization.

      Returns:

    • getLobbiesInfo

      public ArrayList<LobbyDisplayInfo> getLobbiesInfo()
      Returns:
      an HashMap containing the name of the lobbies as key and the number of players in the lobby as value, associated with the number of players needed to start the game

    • addClientToLobby

      public void addClientToLobby(Client client, String lobbyName) throws ClientAlreadyInLobbyException, FullLobbyException, LobbyNotFoundException
      This method adds a client to the lobby having the given name
      Parameters:
      client - the client to add
      lobbyName - the name of the lobby to add the client to
      Throws:
      ClientAlreadyInLobbyException - if the client is already in a lobby
      FullLobbyException - if the lobby is full
      LobbyNotFoundException - if the lobby is not found

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the username is available, false otherwise

    • update

      public void update(Client client, Message message)
      Description copied from interface: Server
      Updates a client with a new message.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Server
      Parameters:
      client - the client to be updated
      message - the message to be sent to the client

    • startHeartBeat

      public void startHeartBeat(Client client)
      Starts the heartbeat mechanism for a specific client. A timer is scheduled to disconnect the client if a heartbeat is not received within a specified timeout.
      Parameters:
      client - the client for which to start the heartbeat mechanism.

    • receiveHeartBeat

      public void receiveHeartBeat(Client client)
      Receives a heartbeat from a specific client. If a heartbeat timer exists for the client, it cancels the timer and starts a new heartbeat timer.
      Parameters:
      client - the client from which a heartbeat is received.

    • stopHeartBeat

      public void stopHeartBeat(Client client)
      Stops the heartbeat mechanism for a specific client. If a heartbeat timer exists for the client, it cancels and purges the timer.
      Parameters:
      client - the client for which to stop the heartbeat mechanism.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect(Client client)
      Disconnects a client from the server.
      Parameters:
      client - the client to disconnect.

    • getClientByUsername

      public Client getClientByUsername(String playername)
      Gets the client object associated with a given player username.
      Parameters:
      playername - the username of the player.
      Returns:
      the client object associated with the player username, or null if not found.

    • removeClient

      public void removeClient(Client client)
      Removes a client from the server's connected clients.
      Parameters:
      client - the client to remove.

    • getConnectedClients

      public HashMap<Client,ClientInfo> getConnectedClients()
      Gets the hashmap containing the connected clients and the associated ClientInfo objects.
      Returns:
      the hashmap containing the connected clients and the associated ClientInfo objects.
